Topic: Draw a string telephone between two students.
Evidence Statements: The student can draw a string telephone that shows how it uses sound to communicate over a distance.
The student can illustrate how the string telephone connects two students, representing the concept of communication over long distances.
The student can include labels or symbols explaining the key parts of the device, such as the cups and string, to demonstrate how the sound travels.
The student can show how the use of the string telephone could help people communicate over distances without modern technology.
The student can depict the materials used in the device to indicate the understanding that specific materials and designs solve communication problems.
